channel.title: I need help with my complier
channel.description: when i run my complier, i always get this message the filename, or volume label syntax is incorrect. can some 1 please help me so i can compile my server.

item.title: I need help with my complier
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Lol @ you

and that is all…

Nah. Mate, you need to put in the Path and Classpath in your environmental variables the jdk 6u7 stuff for that compiler code he gave you…

Also, if you can’t be bothered doing that, I think this compiler code works with any of the newer jdk’s, and without you needing to do the environmental variables thing, so if it doesn’t work then download a newer one plox…

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my complier

item.title: I need help with my complier
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

this one always works…

@echo off
COLOR 14
title Project Swifts Perfect jdk 6u7 compiler -Made by Swift!
echo -------------------------
echo Files Being Compiled…
echo -------------------------
“C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_07/bin/javac” *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Files Successfully Compiled
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause

Read full topic
